name: Aimless Hazard
description:
In Aimless Hazard, your goal is to defend yourself from the relentless waves of enemies by finding weapons scattered around the map. However, you'll lose some of your weapons whenever you get hit!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys / WASD: move
  • Left click / hold: attack
  • Mouse wheel: change selected weapon
  • Right click: throw away selected weapon

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021. Theme: Lost and Found

Sound effects and font are made by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)
